feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-22T00:29:07.204996Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Llama：添加基于语法的采样</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/ggerganov/llama.cpp/pull/1773</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T21 ：29：02.698763Z </更新>; <link href =“https://github.com/ggerganov/llama.cpp/pull/1773”/>; <作者>; <name>;davepeck</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=davepeck</uri>; </author>; <content type =“html”>;<img src =“https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/242054” 3/250365685-5bd15da2-78c1-4625-be90-1e938e6823f1.gif"样式="宽度：220像素；高度：110像素；" />;<br />;本文介绍了一个 API，它采用序列化的上下文无关语法来指导和约束采样。它还提供了一个类似 Backus-Naur 形式 (BNF) 的语法示例，用于指定生成的语法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llama-add-grammar-based-sampling" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36819906" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MiniZinc</stitle>; <id>;https://www.minizinc.org/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T19:29:02.700250Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.minizinc.org/"/>; <author>; <name>;gavi</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gavi</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://www.minizinc.org/MiniZn_logo.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;MiniZinc 是一种高级建模语言，可让您对约束满足和优化问题进行建模。它提供了一个大型的预定义约束库，可以编译成 FlatZinc，这是一种许多解算器都能理解的解算器输入语言。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#minizinc" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36817628" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Web 环境界面grity API提案</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/RupertBenWiser/Web-Environment-Integrity</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T18:29:02.701365Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/RupertBenWiser/Web-Environment-Integrity"/>; <author>; <name>;reactormonk</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=reactormonk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/3e5746f7427e9d6ea003ffda42275633b139b5a896d712bbc80935e54957816b/RupertBenWiser/Web-En vironment-Integrity" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;此存储库详细介绍了添加新 API 以确定 Web 环境完整性的提案：<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#web-environment-integrity-api-proposal" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36817305" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;NativePHP：使用 PHP 构建桌面应用程序的框架</stitle>; <id>;https://nativephp.com/docs/1/getting-started/introduction</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T22:29:02.702326Z</updated>; <link href="https://nativephp.com/docs/ 1/getting-started/introduction"/>; <author>; <name>;brysonreece</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=brysonreece</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;NativePHP 是一个新框架，用于使用 PHP 快速构建丰富的本机桌面应用程序。它使 PHP 开发人员能够使用熟悉的工具和技术创建跨平台的本机应用程序。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nativephp-a-framework-for-building-desktop-apps-using-php" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820555" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Managing Kitchen Fruit Flies with a Little Shop of Horrors</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.zaccohn.com/Fruitflies-and-the-Little-Shop-of-Horrors/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T22:29:02.703624Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.zaccohn.com/Fruitflies-and-the-Little-Shop-of-Horrors/"/>; <author>; <name>;zacharycohn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zacharycohn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.zaccohn.com/images/blog_pitcherplants.jpeg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;每年夏天，作者的厨房尽管定期清洁，但果蝇却出没。他们尝试使用陷阱，但发现它们难看。然后他们发现了肉食性猪笼草，特别是紫猪笼草，它可以有效控制果蝇的数量。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#managing-kitchen-fruit-flies-with-a-little-shop-of-horrors" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820469" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;书评：交易法则</stitle>; <id>;https://astralcodexten.substack.com/p/your-book-review-the-laws-of-trading</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T22:29:02.704647Z</updated>; <link href="https://astralcodexten.substack.com/p/your- book-review-the-laws-of-trading"/>; <作者>; <name>;feross</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=feross</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2F substack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F4c83fb0a-dce8-47ca-9dd7-276236fa4a69_1200x742.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：137px；" />;<br />;奥古斯丁·勒布朗的《交易法则》是一本结合了交易、哲学和决策的独特书籍。勒布朗将金融市场视为一个竞争环境，参与者必须适应，否则就会死亡。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#book-review-the-laws-of-trading" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;好莱坞正在罢工，因为首席执行官们迷上了硅谷的神奇思维</stitle>; <id>;https://www.latimes.com/business/technology /story/2023-07-21/column-hollywood-sag-aftra-strike-strike-silicon-valleys-magical-thinking</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T23:29:02.705634Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.latimes.com/business/technology/story/2023-07-21/column-hollywood -sag-aftra-strike-strike-silicon-valleys-magical-thinking"/>; <author>; <name>;supertimor</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=supertimor</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ca-times.brightspotcdn.com/dims4/default/83b0fea/2147483647/s旅行/true/crop/3929x2702+0+0/resize/1200x825!/quality/80/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalifornia-times-brightspot.s3.amazonaws.com%2F1a%2Fc4%2Fe9e3b807453887a3f7420795e7f6%2F132209 5-me-sag-aftra-strike-34-mjc.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 152px;" />;<br />;好莱坞正在罢工，因为首席执行官们迷上了硅谷的神奇思维。工作室高管们接受了硅谷在过去 10 年里所产生的强大且最终是灾难性的神奇思维，这导致了商业模式的混乱，最终让工人们承担了责任。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hollywood-is-on-strike-because-ceos-fell-for -silicon-valleys-magical-thinking" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821347" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;对于 BSD Unix，它是 Sayon ara（1992）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.tech-insider.org/unix/research/1992/0622.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T18:29:02.706627Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.tech-insider.org/unix/research/1992/0622.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;操作员- name</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=operator-name</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;BSD Unix 的最终版本标志着加州大学伯克利分校参与操作系统业务的结束。 BSD Unix 自 1988 年以来因其无需许可费和尖端技术而在学术界广受欢迎。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#for-bsd-unix-it-s-sayon​​ara-1992" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36817482" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Primo – 带有 Svelte 块、代码编辑器和 SSG 的可视化 CMS</stitle>; <id>;https://primocms.org</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T13:29:02.707697Z</updated>; <link href="https://primocms.org"/>; <author>; <name>;mmmateo</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=mmmateo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://kdtzsoeklezpgshpzqtf.supabase.co/storage/v1/object/public/images/7c1dc1a3-c9eb-4364-b31b-951ecfc2641d/1682111950401Screen%20拍摄%202023-04-21%20at%205.17.27%20PM.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：122px；" />;<br />;邀请任意数量的协作者作为开发人员或内容编辑者，并一起编辑您的页面。在单个服务器上创建无限数量的网站并在几秒钟内启动新网站。将您的站点部署到 Github 存储库。从那里您可以轻松地将其部署到任何网络主机。使用 Primo 的免费主题之一开始运行，并使用 CSS 变量在几秒钟内对其进行自定义。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-primo-a-visual-cms-with-svelte-blocks-a-code-editor-and-ssg" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36813086" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry ry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;烹饪空气质量</stitle>; <id>;https://www.jefftk.com/p/cooking-air-quality</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T23:29:02.708806Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.jefftk.com/p/cooking-air-quality" />; <author>; <name>;miohtama</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=miohtama</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.jefftk.com/article-levels-during-cooking.png" style="width: 220px; height: 134px;" />;<br />;我们的炉子没有向外通风的烟罩，所以当我们做饭时，我们会在窗户上放一个箱式风扇来吹。风扇有助于降低二氧化碳水平并改善空气质量，但 PM2.5 水平在约 45 分钟内仍高于不健康水平。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cooking-air-quality" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820937" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">; 《魔兽世界》玩家欺骗人工智能抓取网站发布废话</stitle>; <id>;https://www.forbes.com/sites/paultassi/2023/07/21/world-of-warcraft-players-trick-ai-scraping-games-website-into-publishing-nonsense/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T16:29:02.709928 Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.forbes.com/sites/paultassi/2023/07/21/world-of-warcraft-players-trick-ai-scraping-games-website-into-publishing-nonsense/"/>; <作者>; <name>;mikhael</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mikhael</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/60405e99c4959a8b4cd30b0e/400x0.jpg?cropX1=0&cropX2=1080&cropY1=0&cropY2=1080" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;Reddit 魔兽世界子版块发现一个网站正在抓取他们的帖子并使用人工智能来生成文章。作为回应，Reddit 用户创建了一个关于游戏中不存在的功能的假帖子，并且该网站发布了一篇基于该帖子的文章。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#world-of-warcraft-players-trick-ai-scraping-website-into-publishing-nonsense" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36815744" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;记者应对包括科学家在内的所有来源保持怀疑</stitle>; <id>;https://natesilver.substack.com/p/journalists-should-be-skeptical-of</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T20:29:02.711069Z</updated>; <link href="https://natesilver. substack.com/p/journalists-should-be-skeptical-of"/>; <作者>; <name>;amadeuspagel</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=amadeuspagel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:ste ep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F2e937c74-f2b6-478a-aa5d-c485635efa71_820x385.webp" style="宽度：220px；高度：104px；" />;<br />;一组科学家在《自然医学》杂志上发表了一篇关于 COVID-19 起源的论文，该论文与他们的真实信念相矛盾，并误导了公众。作者操纵媒体叙事，并受到职业影响和政治强烈反对的动机。记者应该对所有消息来源保持怀疑，包括科学家。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#journalists-should-be-be-be-sketical-of----------------------- >; </content>; </entry>; <条目xml：base =“ https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml”>; <Title type type type =“ text”>; rfc 9420 Aka Mesidage Leseging Lesely Security </stitle>; 9：02.712971Z </更新>; <link href =“ https://blog.phnx.im/rfc-9420-mls/”/>; <uname>; <Name>; g src =“ https://blog.phnx.im/content/images/size/w960/2023/07/header-mls-rfc.png“ style =” width：220px; height; height; height; height; 134px;'' />;<br />;消息层安全 (MLS) 协议以 RFC 9420 的形式发布，是第一个标准化且完全指定的端到端加密协议。它在可扩展性和效率方面对现有协议进行了改进。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rfc-9420-aka-messaging-layer-security" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36815705" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;大型科技作为新的大型烟草</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bigtechwiki.com/index.php/Big_Tech_as_the_New_Big_Tobacco</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T20:29:02.714004Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.bigtechwiki.com/index.php/Big_Tech_as_the_New _Big_Tobacco"/>; <author>; <name>;Andrex</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Andrex</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;共和党人和民主党人将大型科技与大型烟草进行比较，立法者表达了对其产品对社会有害影响的担忧。这两个行业都资助学术研究来影响公众舆论并保持正面形象。大型科技公司对外部组织的支出增加，给学术人员寻求外部资金带来了压力。大型科技公司还为知名智库和非营利组织做出了重大贡献，这有助于促进政府和科技行业之间的相互介绍。同样，大烟草公司以其大规模的游说努力和在国会山的大量存在而闻名。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#big-tech-as-the-new-big-tobacco" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36818640" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;Slackware Linux 发行版已满 30 岁</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theregister.com/2023/07/20/slackware_turns_30/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T19:29:02.717784Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theregister.com/2023/07/20/sl ackware_turns_30/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;akoster</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=akoster</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://regmedia.co.uk/2023/07/19/slack-15-boot.png?x=648&y=360&infer_y=1" style="width: 220px;高度：123px；” />;<br />;Slackware Linux 项目正在庆祝其成立 30 周年。它是仍在积极维护和开发的最古老的 Linux 发行版。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#slackware-linux-distribution-turns-30-years-old" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36818233" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;不要取笑著名的丹·布朗 (2013)</stitle>; <id>;https://onehundredpages.wordpress.com/2013/06/12/dont-make-fun-of-renowned-dan-brown/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T20:29:02.719020Z</updated>; <link href="https ://onehundredpages.wordpress.com/2013/06/12/dont-make-fun-of-renowned-dan-brown/"/>; <author>; <name>;codetrotter</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=codetrotter</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;著名作家丹·布朗醒来时很生气，因为他知道他的新书会受到评论家的攻击。尽管受到批评，他的经纪人还是让他放心，并意识到他数以百万计的粉丝和财富比少数批评者的意见更重要。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#dont-make-fun-of-renowned-dan-brown-2013" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36818501" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FreeWilly 1 和 2，两个新的开放获取法学硕士</stitle>; <id>;https://stability.ai/blog/freewilly-large-instruction-fine-tuned-models</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T20:29:02.719998Z</updated>; <link href="https://stability.ai/blog/freewilly-large-in struction-fine-tuned-models"/>; <author>; <name>;anigbrowl</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=anigbrowl</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6213c340453c3f502425776e/29202f99-d2d 9-412f-8aeb-f2881514b920/Arcane_magic_with_an_orca_whale_swimming_in_the_galaxy_filled_with_vibrant_stars_steps-40_style-Pixel_Art_seed-0ts-1689963125_idx-0.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;Stability AI 及其 CarperAI 实验室发布了 FreeWilly1 和 FreeWilly2，这两个新的开放访问大型语言模型 (LLM) 展示了卓越的推理能力。这些模型是在非商业许可下发布的研究实验。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#freewilly-1-and-2-two-new-open-access-llms" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36818923" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;IMAX 模拟 PalmPilot 软件为 Oppenheimer 的 70 毫米版本提供动力</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/07/imax-emulates-palmpilot-software-to-power-oppenheimers-70-mm-release/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T19:29:02.72 1073Z</updated>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/07/imax-emulates-palmpilot-software-to-power-oppenheimers-70-mm-release/"/>; <author>; <name>;riffraff</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=riffraff</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/oppenheimer-800x362.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：100px；" />;<br />;IMAX 发布了 70 毫米格式的电影《奥本海默》，这是自 2020 年《信条》以来首部 70 毫米 IMAX 电影。该电影在 PalmPilot 模拟器上运行，特别是 Palm m130，它被用作运行 70 毫米电影的控制器。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#imax-emulates-palmpilot-software-to-power-oppenheimers-70-mm-release" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36817900" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我用 Rust 编写了一个 JVM</stitle>; <id>;https://andreabergia.com/blog/2023/07/i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T09:29:02.724081Z</updated>; <link href="https://andreabergia.com /blog/2023/07/i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust/"/>; <author>; <name>;lukastyrychtr</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lukastyrychtr</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://andreabergia.com/images/2023/07/gc1.png" style="width: 2 20 像素；高度：103 像素；" />;<br />;我用 Rust 编写了一个 Java 虚拟机，称为 rjvm。它是一个出于学习目的而构建的玩具 JVM，而不是一个严肃的实现。它支持执行字节码指令、处理局部变量和堆栈元素以及调用方法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811554" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;在法学硕士领域，“开源”被用来表示“可下载权重”</stitle>; <id>;https://www.alessiofanelli.com/blog/llama2-isnt-open-source</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T16:29:02.725068Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.alessiofanelli.com/blog/llama2-isnt-开源"/>; <author>; <name>;FanaHOVA</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=FanaHOVA</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.alessiofanelli.com/images/open-models.png" style="width: 220px; height: 112px;" />;<br />;LLaMA2 是一种因滥用“开源”一词而受到批评的语言模型。虽然它有一些开放的方面，例如商业用途权重的可用性，但也有一些与开源精神背道而驰的限制。然而，作者认为“开源”一词需要在人工智能模型领域不断发展。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#in-the-llm-space-open-source-is-being-used-to-mean-downloadable-weights" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36815255" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;关于儿童期虐待与多动症之间关系的纵向研究</stitle>; <id>;https://www.psypost.org/2023/07/longitudinal-study-highlights-bidirection-relationship- Between-childhood-maltreatment-and-adhd-symptoms-166568</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21 T17:29:02.726273Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.psypost.org/2023/07/longitudinal-study-highlights-bidirect-relationship- Between-childhood-maltreatment-and-adhd-symptoms-166568"/>; <作者>; <name>;geox</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=geox</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.psypost.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/upset-young-boy-sitting-and-crying-sad-750x375.jpg" style="width: 220px;身高：110px;" />;<br />;新研究提供了儿童虐待与多动症症状之间双向关联的证据。更容易心烦意乱和烦躁的婴儿长大后更有可能出现多动症症状。这些婴儿也更有可能遭受虐待，例如虐待或忽视。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#longitudinal-study-on-the-relationship- Between-childhood-maltreatment-and-adhd" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36816436" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Odin 编程的小乐趣</stitle>; <id>;http://www.zannzen.com /blog/small_joys_with_odin_1/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T11:29:02.728268Z</updated>; <link href="http://www.zannzen.com/blog/small_joys_with_odin_1/"/>; <author>; <name>;lerno</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lerno</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;Odin 是一种面向数据且实用的类 C 语言。它是迄今为止经历过最少“wtf”的系统编程语言。 Odin 具有内置的生活质量功能，例如用于标志和数组编程的位集。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#small-joys-of-programming-in-odin" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36812175" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;暗黑破坏神</stitle>; <id>;https://www.filfre.net/2023/07/diablo/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T16:29:02.729178Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.filfre.net/2023/07/diablo/"/>; <author>; <name>;doppp</name>; <uri>;https://news.y Combinator.com/user?id=doppp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.filfre.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/6117082-diablo-windows-front-cover-236x300.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：281px；" />;<br />;《暗黑破坏神》的创作者 David Brevik 和 Schaefer 兄弟对 20 世纪 90 年代中期电脑角色扮演游戏的发展方向感到失望。他们想要创造一款去除过多故事和统计数据并专注于令人上瘾的游戏玩法的游戏。他们在暴雪娱乐找到了合作伙伴，后者刚刚发布了《魔兽争霸》，正在寻找下一个大项目。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#diablo" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36815781" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;90年代互联网：当在线 20 小时触发来自 ISP 总裁的电子邮件</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/07/the-90s-internet-when-20-hours-online-triggered-an-email-from-my-isps-president/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T13:29:02.731249Z</updated>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/07/the-90s-internet-when-20-hours-online-triggered-an-email-from-my-isps-president/"/>; <author>; <name>;mfiguiere</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mfiguiere</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/banj-edwards-terminally-online2-800x450.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;1998 年，收到 ISP 总裁发来的关于在线时间超过 20 小时的电子邮件是很不寻常的。互联网接入并不总是在线，每一条被占用的电话线都意味着另一个客户无法使用它。该电子邮件要求用户在每次会话后断开连接以共享资源。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#90s-internet-when-20-hours-online-triggered-an-email-from-my-isps-president" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36813210" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Meta 停止订购 Quest Pro 的新部件</stitle>; <id>;https://www.zdnet.com/article/meta-cancels-quest-pro-stops-development-of-quest-pro-2/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T21:29:02.732348Z</updated>; <link href ="https://www.zdnet.com/article/meta-cancels-quest-pro-stops-development-of-quest-pro-2/"/>; <author>; <name>;miiiiiiike</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=miiiiiiike</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.zdnet.com/a/img/resize/8f7dd51af53ef c58de2c3beeb229175f2ca19303/2022/08/05/d89921b7-c002-40ef-8401-f002f1a769e9/maria-diaz.jpg?auto=webp&fit=crop&frame=1&height=192&width=192" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px ;” />;<br />;Meta 正在取消其高端 VR/AR 耳机 Meta Quest Pro 及其后继产品 Quest Pro 2 的开发。该公司正专注于开发更实惠的耳机，即将推出 Meta Quest 3。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#meta-stops-ordering-new-parts-for-quest-pro" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=36819894" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
